description: This herby middle eastern bulghur wheat dish makes a fantastic side or light lunch option.
name: Fig & Almond Tabbouleh Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium lemon, juice of 2, zest of 1

recipeInstructions.text: Place the rinsed bulghur wheat in a large bowl and cover with 400ml of boiling water. Cover and set aside for 30 minutes to absorb.
Once cooked, fluff up the bulghur wheat with a fork, add the herbs, lemon zest, spring onions, figs and flaked almonds and mix well.
Pour over the lemon juice and olive oil, toss and serve.
